title: As Dollar Strengthens, U.S. Students in Europe Feel the Benefits
description: The pound and the euro are trading at decades-long lows against the dollar. For American students abroad, that has made weekend trips, dinners and theater tickets (somewhat) less of a splurge.
dc:creator: Jenny Gross
media:credit: Mary Turner for The New York Times
media:description: Avery Scott, a junior at the University of Georgia, is currently studying at the University of Oxford in England, where her money has gone further because of the falling value of the British pound.
